markdownRemark.html:
#include <stdio.h>
//#include <math.h>
int main() {
    int n, failA = 0, failB = 0;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    for (int i = 0; i < n ; i++) {
        int a1, a2, b1, b2;
        scanf("%d%d%d%d", &a1, &a2, &b1, &b2);
        if (a1 + b1 == a2 && a1 + b1 != b2) {//甲猜中
            failB++;
        }else if(a1 + b1 != a2 && a1 + b1 == b2){
            failA++;
        }
    }
    printf("%d %d\n", failA, failB);
    return 0;
}
